00016 #include "BGTrafficHandle.h"
00017 #include "Ieee802Ctrl_m.h"
00018 
00019 #define ETHERAPP_BUFFER_SAP  0xe0
00020 
00021 namespace TTEthernetModel {
00022 
00023 Define_Module(BGTrafficHandle);
00024 
00025 void BGTrafficHandle::initialize()
00026 {
00027     Ieee802Ctrl *etherctrl = new Ieee802Ctrl();
00028     etherctrl->setDsap(ETHERAPP_BUFFER_SAP);
00029     cMessage *msg = new cMessage("register_DSAP", IEEE802CTRL_REGISTER_DSAP);
00030     msg->setControlInfo(etherctrl);
00031 
00032     send(msg, "lowerLayerOut");
00033 }
00034 
00035 void BGTrafficHandle::handleMessage(cMessage *msg)
00036 {
00037     if(msg->arrivedOn("lowerLayerIn")){
00038         send(msg, "out");
00039     }
00040     else if(msg->arrivedOn("in")){
00041         Ieee802Ctrl *etherctrl = new Ieee802Ctrl();
00042         etherctrl->setSsap(ETHERAPP_BUFFER_SAP);
00043         etherctrl->setDsap(ETHERAPP_BUFFER_SAP);
00044         msg->setControlInfo(etherctrl);
00045         send(msg, "lowerLayerOut");
00046     }
00047 }
00048 
00049 } //namespace
